channel.title: CVE Feed for 2j-slideshow -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 2j-slideshow -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4604|2024-08-19T13:47:07.515Z -- 2j-slideshow -- slideshow%2C%20image%20slider%20by%202j
item.description: The Slideshow, Image Slider by 2J plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘post’ parameter in versions up to, and including, 1.3.54 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2023-4604|2024-08-17T07:34:25.254Z -- 2j-slideshow -- slideshow%2C%20image%20slider%20by%202j
item.description: The Slideshow, Image Slider by 2J plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘post’ parameter in versions up to, and including, 1.3.54 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
